title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Enhancing Scientific Thinking Through Individualized Online Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners perform self-directed learning at least three times weekly using personalized microlearning content
Learners analyze their learning patterns through formative assessments and establish optimal learning strategies
Learners accurately identify and correct 80% or more of errors occurring in the scientific problem-solving process
Learners improve learning efficiency by over 20% using learning analytics data in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
